import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { CheckCircle, Users, Target, TrendingUp, Shield, Zap, Menu, X } from 'lucide-react'; import './css/features.css' const Features = () => { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [scrolled, setScrolled] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { // Handle scroll event const handleScroll = () => { setScrolled(window.scrollY > 50); }; window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); // Reset scroll on reload window.onbeforeunload = () => window.scrollTo(0, 0); return () => { window.removeEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); window.onbeforeunload = null; // cleanup }; }, []); return (
